query.value:
select COMP_NAME as COMP_NAME,  REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_MONTH_BID_RESULT_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMM')
;

query.value:
WITH vw_range AS (
    SELECT 
        (g * 1000 + 1) AS st,
        ((g + 1) * 1000) AS ed
    FROM generate_series(678, 680) AS g
)
SELECT r.st, r.ed
FROM vw_range r
LEFT JOIN cd_ods.tb_fsk_I0300_temp t
    ON r.st = CAST(t.st AS NUMERIC) AND r.ed = CAST(t.ed AS NUMERIC)
and t.evl_yr  = '2023'
    WHERE t.st IS null
;

with vw_range as
(
select generate_series(0,552) * 1000 + 1000001 as st, (generate_series(0,552)+1) * 1000 + 1000000 as ed
)
select st, ed from vw_range
where (st, ed) not in 
(select distinct cast(st as numeric), cast(ed as numeric) from cd_ods.tb_fsk_i2500_temp)
;
